data.title: JJ Redick on the Lakers: 'One of the things last year with this team, they played a lot of random'
data.meta_description: Ryan Ward: JJ Redick on how the Lakers will look different offensively: "One of the things last year with this team, they played a lot of random. If you look at the efficiency numbers when they played random versus when they played out of sets, the sets had a much higher efficiency.
data.text:
By HoopsHype |

Ryan Ward: JJ Redick on how the Lakers will look different offensively: ‚ÄúOne of the things last year with this team, they played a lot of random. If you look at the efficiency numbers when they played random versus when they played out of sets, the sets had a much higher efficiency.‚Äù

Source: Twitter @RyanWardLA

More on this storyline

But most importantly, Redick knows that he‚Äôs right where he belongs. And he will be fighting to stay where he is with everything he‚Äôs got. ‚ÄúThe other is in my retirement, I realize what gives me fulfillment and what gives me drive and motivation, and that‚Äôs competition. That‚Äôs performance. That‚Äôs collaboration, being part of a team. I certainly felt all of that doing media,‚Äù Redick added. -via Clutch Points / July 13, 2024

Nonetheless, JJ Redick knew all of that coming in and still relishes the opportunity to coach the Lakers. After all, he wants to experience the thrill of the pressure that comes with competing against the best of the best under the blinding spotlight in Los Angeles. ‚ÄúI felt a calling to coach. Part of that is that I‚Äôm just a sicko, and I‚Äôm a masochist, and I want to sign up for high stakes, high pressure,‚Äù Redick said, per Ryan Ward of Lakers Nation. -via Clutch Points / July 13, 2024

Ryan Ward: JJ Redick on how the Lakers will play next season: ‚ÄúWe have LeBron and AD on our team. Those guys are obviously going to be offensive hubs. But we are going to play with more movement, more cutting and we have to certainly get buy-in from all the players to play that way.‚Äù -via Twitter @RyanWardLA / July 12, 2024
